item.title: Mercedes-Benz will let you use an in-car camera in Microsoft Teams while driving
item.description: I like to drive without the distractions of my work life interrupting me, but if you’re eager to stay connected then Mercedes-Benz is ready. You’ll soon be able to join a Microsoft Teams call in some
